verses.verse: Then<WG5119> Jesus<WG2424> spoke<WG2980> to the multitudes<WG3793> and<WG2532> to<WG3101> his<WG846> disciples,<WG3101>
saying,<WG3004> "The scribes<WG1122> and<WG2532> the Pharisees<WG5330> sat<WG2523> on<WG1909> Moses<WG3475>' seat.<WG2515>

All<WG3956> things therefore<WG3767> whatever<WG3745> they tell<WG2036> you<WG5213> to observe,<WG5083> observe<WG5083> and<WG2532> do,<WG4160> but<WG1161> don't<WG3361> do<WG4160> their<WG846> works;<WG2041> for<WG1063> they say,<WG3004> and<WG2532> don't<WG3756> do.<WG4160>

For<WG1063> they bind<WG1195> heavy<WG926> burdens<WG5413> that are grievous to be borne,<WG1419> and<WG2532> lay<WG2007> them on<WG1909> men<WG444>'s shoulders;<WG5606> but<WG1161> they themselves will<WG2309> not<WG3756> lift<WG2795> a finger<WG1147> to<WG1147> help<WG846> them.<WG846>

But<WG1161> all<WG3956> their<WG846> works<WG2041> they do<WG4160> to<WG4314> be seen<WG2300> by men.<WG444> They make their<WG846> phylacteries<WG5440> broad,<WG4115> enlarge<WG3170> the fringes<WG2899> of<WG2440> their<WG846> garments,<WG2440>
and<WG5037> love<WG5368> the place<WG4411> of honor at<WG1722> feasts,<WG1173> the best seats<WG4410> in<WG1722> the synagogues,<WG4864>
the salutations<WG783> in<WG1722> the marketplaces,<WG58> and<WG2532> to be called<WG2564> <WG4461> 'Rabbi, Rabbi<WG4461>' by<WG5259> men.<WG444>

But<WG1161> don't<WG3361> you<WG5210> be<WG2564> called<WG2564> <WG4461> 'Rabbi,' for<WG1063> one<WG1520> is<WG2076> your<WG5216> teacher,<WG2519> the Christ,<WG5547> and<WG1161> all<WG3956> of you<WG5210> are<WG2075> brothers.<WG80>
Call<WG2564> no<WG3361> man on<WG1909> the earth<WG1093> your<WG5216> father,<WG3962> for<WG1063> one<WG1520> is<WG2076> your<WG5216> Father,<WG3962> he who is<WG3588> in<WG1722> heaven.<WG3772>
Neither<WG3366> be called<WG2564> masters,<WG2519> for<WG1063> one<WG1520> is<WG2076> your<WG5216> master,<WG2519> the Christ.<WG5547>
But<WG1161> he who is greatest<WG3187> among you<WG5216> will be<WG2071> your<WG5216> servant.<WG1249>
Whoever<WG3748> exalts<WG5312> himself<WG1438> will be humbled,<WG5013> and<WG1161> whoever<WG3748> humbles<WG5013> himself<WG1438> will be exalted.<WG5312>

"But woe<WG3759> to you,<WG5213> scribes<WG1122> and<WG2532> Pharisees,<WG5330> hypocrites!<WG5273> Because<WG3754> you shut up<WG2808> the Kingdom<WG932> of Heaven<WG3772> against<WG1715> men;<WG444> for<WG1063> you<WG5210> don't<WG3756> enter in<WG1525> yourselves,<WG3761> neither do you<WG863> allow those who are entering<WG1525> in to enter.<WG1525>

"Woe<WG3759> to you,<WG5213> scribes<WG1122> and<WG2532> Pharisees,<WG5330> hypocrites!<WG5273> For<WG3754> you devour<WG2719> widows<WG5503>' houses,<WG3614> and<WG2532> as a pretense<WG4392> you make<WG4336> long<WG3117> prayers.<WG1223> Therefore<WG5124> you will receive<WG2983> greater<WG4053> condemnation.<WG2917>

Woe<WG3759> to you,<WG5213> scribes<WG1122> and<WG2532> Pharisees,<WG5330> hypocrites!<WG5273> For<WG3754> you travel around<WG4013> by sea<WG2281> and<WG2532> land<WG3584> to make<WG4160> one<WG1520> proselyte;<WG4339> and<WG2532> when<WG3752> he becomes<WG1096> one,<WG4160> you make him<WG846> twice as much<WG1362> of a son<WG5207> of Gehenna<WG1067> as yourselves.<WG5216>

"Woe<WG3759> to you,<WG5213> you blind<WG5185> guides,<WG3595> who say,<WG3004> <WG3739> 'Whoever swears<WG3660> by<WG1722> the temple,<WG3485> it is<WG2076> nothing;<WG3762> but<WG1161> whoever<WG3739> swears<WG3660> by<WG1722> the gold<WG5557> of the temple,<WG3485> he is obligated.<WG3784>'
You blind<WG5185> fools!<WG3474> For<WG1063> which<WG5101> is<WG2076> greater,<WG3187> the gold,<WG5557> or<WG2228> the temple<WG3485> that sanctifies<WG37> the gold?<WG5557>

<WG1437> 'Whoever swears<WG3660> by<WG1722> the altar,<WG2379> it is<WG2076> nothing;<WG3762> but<WG1161> whoever<WG302> swears<WG3660> by<WG1722> the gift<WG1435> that is on<WG1883> it,<WG846> he is obligated?<WG3784>'
You blind<WG5185> fools!<WG3474> For<WG1063> which<WG5101> is greater,<WG3173> the gift,<WG1435> or<WG2228> the altar<WG2379> that sanctifies<WG37> the gift?<WG1435>
He<WG3660> therefore<WG3767> who swears<WG3660> by<WG1722> the altar,<WG2379> swears<WG3660> by<WG1722> it,<WG846> and<WG2532> by<WG1722> everything<WG3956> on it.<WG846>
He<WG2532> who swears<WG3660> by<WG1722> the temple,<WG3485> swears<WG3660> by<WG1722> it,<WG846> and<WG2532> by<WG1722> him who was living<WG2730> in it.<WG2730>
He<WG2532> who swears<WG3660> by<WG1722> heaven,<WG3772> swears<WG3660> by<WG1722> the throne<WG2362> of God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> by<WG1722> him who sits<WG2521> on it.<WG846>

"Woe<WG3759> to you,<WG5213> scribes<WG1122> and<WG2532> Pharisees,<WG5330> hypocrites!<WG5273> For<WG3754> you tithe<WG586> mint,<WG2238> dill,<WG432> and<WG2532> cumin,<WG2951> and<WG2532> have left undone<WG863> the weightier<WG926> matters of the law:<WG3551> justice,<WG2532> mercy,<WG1656> and<WG2532> faith.<WG4102> But you<WG1163> ought to have done<WG4160> these,<WG5023> and<WG2548> not<WG3361> to have left<WG863> the other<WG2548> undone.<WG863>
You blind<WG5185> guides,<WG3595> who strain out<WG1368> a gnat,<WG2971> and<WG1161> swallow<WG2666> a camel!<WG2574>

"Woe<WG3759> to you,<WG5213> scribes<WG1122> and<WG2532> Pharisees,<WG5330> hypocrites!<WG5273> For<WG3754> you clean<WG2511> the outside<WG1855> of the cup<WG4221> and<WG2532> of the platter,<WG3953> but<WG1161> within<WG2081> they are full<WG1073> of<WG1537> extortion<WG724> and<WG2532> unrighteousness.<WG192>

You blind<WG5185> Pharisee,<WG5330> first<WG4412> clean<WG2511> the inside<WG1787> of the cup<WG4221> and<WG2532> of the platter,<WG3953> that<WG2443> its<WG846> outside<WG1622> may become<WG1096> clean<WG2513> also.<WG2532>

"Woe<WG3759> to you,<WG5213> scribes<WG1122> and<WG2532> Pharisees,<WG5330> hypocrites!<WG5273> For<WG3754> you are like whitened<WG2867> tombs,<WG5028> which<WG3748> outwardly<WG1855> appear<WG5316> beautiful,<WG5611> but<WG1161> inwardly<WG2081> are<WG1073> full<WG1073> of<WG3747> dead<WG3498> men<WG3747>'s bones, and<WG2532> of<WG3747> all<WG3956> uncleanness.<WG167>

Even so<WG3779> you<WG5210> also<WG2532> outwardly<WG1855> appear<WG5316> righteous<WG1342> to men,<WG444> but<WG1161> inwardly<WG2081> you are<WG2075> full<WG3324> of hypocrisy<WG5272> and<WG2532> iniquity.<WG458>

"Woe<WG3759> to you,<WG5213> scribes<WG1122> and<WG2532> Pharisees,<WG5330> hypocrites!<WG5273> For<WG3754> you build<WG3618> the tombs<WG5028> of the prophets,<WG4396> and<WG2532> decorate<WG2885> the tombs<WG3419> of the righteous,<WG1342>

and<WG2532> say,<WG3004> <WG1487> 'If we had lived<WG1510> in<WG1722> the days<WG2250> of<WG3962> our<WG2257> fathers,<WG3962> we<WG302> wouldn't<WG3756> have been<WG1510> partakers<WG2844> with them<WG846> in<WG1722> the blood<WG129> of the prophets.<WG4396>'
Therefore<WG5620> you testify<WG3140> to yourselves<WG1438> that<WG3754> you are<WG2075> children<WG5207> of those who killed<WG5407> the prophets.<WG4396>
Fill<WG4137> up,<WG4137> then,<WG2532> the measure<WG3358> of<WG3962> your<WG5216> fathers.<WG3962>
You serpents,<WG3789> you offspring<WG1081> of vipers,<WG2191> how will<WG4459> you escape<WG5343> the<WG575> judgment<WG2920> of Gehenna?<WG1067>

Therefore,<WG5124> behold,<WG2400> I<WG1473> send<WG649> to<WG4314> you<WG5209> prophets,<WG4396> wise men,<WG4680> and<WG2532> scribes.<WG1122> Some of<WG1537> them<WG846> you will kill<WG615> and<WG2532> crucify;<WG4717> and<WG2532> some of<WG1537> them<WG846> you will scourge<WG3146> in<WG1722> your<WG5216> synagogues,<WG4864> and<WG2532> persecute<WG1377> from<WG575> city<WG4172> to<WG1519> city;<WG4172>

that<WG3704> on<WG1909> you<WG5209> may come<WG2064> all<WG3956> the righteous<WG1342> blood<WG129> shed<WG1632> on<WG1909> the earth,<WG1093> from<WG575> the blood<WG129> of righteous<WG1342> Abel<WG6> to<WG2193> the blood<WG129> of Zachariah<WG2197> son<WG5207> of Barachiah,<WG914> whom<WG3739> you killed<WG5407> between<WG3342> the sanctuary<WG3485> and<WG2532> the altar.<WG2379>
Most certainly<WG281> I tell<WG3004> you,<WG5213> all<WG3956> these things<WG5023> will come<WG2240> upon<WG1909> this<WG3778> generation.<WG1074>

"Jerusalem,<WG2419> Jerusalem,<WG2419> who kills<WG615> the prophets,<WG4396> and<WG2532> stones<WG3036> those who are sent<WG649> to<WG4314> her!<WG846> How often<WG4212> I would have<WG2309> gathered<WG1996> your<WG4675> children<WG5043> together,<WG1996> even<WG3739> as<WG5158> a hen<WG3733> gathers<WG1996> her<WG1438> chicks<WG3556> under<WG5259> her wings,<WG4420> and<WG2532> you would<WG2309> not!<WG3756>
Behold,<WG2400> your<WG5216> house<WG3624> is left<WG863> to you<WG5213> desolate.<WG2048>

For<WG1063> I tell<WG3004> you,<WG5213> you will<WG1492> not<WG3756> see<WG1492> me<WG3165> from now<WG737> on,<WG2193> until you<WG302> say,<WG2036> <WG2127> 'Blessed is he who comes<WG2064> in<WG1722> the name<WG3686> of the Lord!<WG2962>'"
